name: Game Tournament Trophy
description: The native cryptographically-secure fungible protocol token of CricketFly (Game Tournament Trophy ticker symbol $GTT) is a transferable representation of attributed utility functions specified in the protocol/code of CricketFly, and which is designed to be used solely as an interoperable utility token thereon. $GTT will be issued as a ERC-20 token, with total supply of 10 billion.
